seminorm_le_bound':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- If one controls the seminorm for every `x`, then one controls the seminorm.

Variant for functions `𝓢(ℝ, F)`. -/
theorem seminorm_le_bound' (k n : ℕ) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» (exprℝ) F) {M : exprℝ} (hMp : 0 ≤ M)
    (hM : ∀ x, |x| ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_deriv n f x) ≤ M) : Seminorm 𝕜 k n f ≤ M :=
  by
  refine' seminorm_le_bound 𝕜 k n f hMp _
  simpa only [Real.norm_eq_abs, norm_iterated_fderiv_eq_norm_iterated_deriv]
#align seminorm_le_bound' seminorm_le_bound'
seminorm_le_bound:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- If one controls the seminorm for every `x`, then one controls the seminorm. -/
theorem seminorm_le_bound (k n : ℕ) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) {M : exprℝ} (hMp : 0 ≤ M)
    (hM : ∀ x, «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n f x) ≤ M) : Seminorm 𝕜 k n f ≤ M :=
  f.seminorm_aux_le_bound k n hMp hM
#align seminorm_le_bound seminorm_le_bound
seminorm_aux_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
theorem seminorm_aux_zero (k n : ℕ) : (0 : «expr𝓢( , )» E F).seminorm_aux k n = 0 :=
  le_antisymm (seminorm_aux_le_bound k n _ rfl.le fun _ => by simp [Pi.zero_def]) (seminorm_aux_nonneg _ _ _)
#align seminorm_aux_zero seminorm_aux_zero
seminorm_aux_smul_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem seminorm_aux_smul_le (k n : ℕ) (c : 𝕜) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) :
    («expr • » c f).seminorm_aux k n ≤ «expr‖ ‖» c * f.seminorm_aux k n :=
  by
  refine'
    («expr • » c f).seminorm_aux_le_bound k n (mul_nonneg (norm_nonneg _) (seminorm_aux_nonneg _ _ _)) fun x =>
      (decay_smul_aux k n f c x).le.trans _
  rw [mul_assoc]
  exact mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left (f.le_seminorm_aux k n x) (norm_nonneg _)
#align seminorm_aux_smul_le seminorm_aux_smul_le
seminorm_aux_nonneg:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
theorem seminorm_aux_nonneg (k n : ℕ) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) : 0 ≤ f.seminorm_aux k n :=
  le_cinfₛ (bounds_nonempty k n f) fun _ ⟨hx, _⟩ => hx
#align seminorm_aux_nonneg seminorm_aux_nonneg
seminorm_aux_le_bound:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- If one controls the norm of every `A x`, then one controls the norm of `A`. -/
theorem seminorm_aux_le_bound (k n : ℕ) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) {M : exprℝ} (hMp : 0 ≤ M)
    (hM : ∀ x, «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n f x) ≤ M) : f.seminorm_aux k n ≤ M :=
  cinfₛ_le (bounds_bdd_below k n f) ⟨hMp, hM⟩
#align seminorm_aux_le_bound seminorm_aux_le_bound
seminorm_aux_add_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
theorem seminorm_aux_add_le (k n : ℕ) (f g : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) :
    (f + g).seminorm_aux k n ≤ f.seminorm_aux k n + g.seminorm_aux k n :=
  (f + g).seminorm_aux_le_bound k n (add_nonneg (seminorm_aux_nonneg _ _ _) (seminorm_aux_nonneg _ _ _)) fun x =>
    (decay_add_le_aux k n f g x).trans <| add_le_add (f.le_seminorm_aux k n x) (g.le_seminorm_aux k n x)
#align seminorm_aux_add_le seminorm_aux_add_le
schwartz_with_seminorms:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem _root_.schwartz_with_seminorms : with_seminorms (schwartz_seminorm_family 𝕜 E F) :=
  by
  have A : with_seminorms (schwartz_seminorm_family (exprℝ) E F) := ⟨rfl⟩
  rw [seminorm_family.with_seminorms_iff_nhds_eq_infi] at A⊢
  rw [A]
  rfl
#align schwartz_with_seminorms schwartz_with_seminorms

one_add_le_sup_seminorm_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- A more convenient version of `le_sup_seminorm_apply`.

The set `finset.Iic m` is the set of all pairs `(k', n')` with `k' ≤ m.1` and `n' ≤ m.2`.
Note that the constant is far from optimal. -/
theorem one_add_le_sup_seminorm_apply {m : ℕ × ℕ} {k n : ℕ} (hk : k ≤ m.1) (hn : n ≤ m.2) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F)
    (x : E) :
    (1 + «expr‖ ‖» x) ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n f x) ≤
      2 ^ m.1 * (Finset.Iic m).sup (fun m => Seminorm 𝕜 m.1 m.2) f :=
  by
  rw [add_comm, add_pow]
  simp only [one_pow, mul_one, Finset.sum_congr, Finset.sum_mul]
  norm_cast
  rw [← Nat.sum_range_choose m.1]
  push_cast
  rw [Finset.sum_mul]
  have hk' : Finset.range (k + 1) ⊆ Finset.range (m.1 + 1) := by rwa [Finset.range_subset, add_le_add_iff_right]
  refine' le_trans (Finset.sum_le_sum_of_subset_of_nonneg hk' fun _ _ _ => by positivity) _
  refine' Finset.sum_le_sum fun i hi => _
  rw [mul_comm («expr‖ ‖» x ^ i), mul_assoc]
  refine' mul_le_mul _ _ (by positivity) (by positivity)
  · norm_cast
    exact i.choose_le_choose hk
  exact
    (le_seminorm 𝕜 i n f x).trans
      (Seminorm.le_def.1
        (Finset.le_sup_of_le (Finset.mem_Iic.2 <| Prod.mk_le_mk.2 ⟨finset.mem_range_succ_iff.mp hi, hn⟩) le_rfl) _)
#align one_add_le_sup_seminorm_apply one_add_le_sup_seminorm_apply
norm_pow_mul_le_seminorm:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem norm_pow_mul_le_seminorm (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) (k : ℕ) (x₀ : E) :
    «expr‖ ‖» x₀ ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (f x₀) ≤ (schwartz_map.seminorm 𝕜 k 0) f :=
  by
  have := schwartz_map.le_seminorm 𝕜 k 0 f x₀
  rwa [norm_iterated_fderiv_zero] at this
#align norm_pow_mul_le_seminorm norm_pow_mul_le_seminorm

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/

le_seminorm_aux:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- The seminorm controls the Schwartz estimate for any fixed `x`.

Variant for functions `𝓢(ℝ, F)`. -/
theorem le_seminorm' (k n : ℕ) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» (exprℝ) F) (x : exprℝ) :
    |x| ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_deriv n f x) ≤ Seminorm 𝕜 k n f :=

le_seminorm:

theorem le_seminorm (k n : ℕ) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) (x : E) :
    «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n f x) ≤ Seminorm 𝕜 k n f :=
  f.le_seminorm_aux k n x

is_O_cocompact_zpow_neg_nat:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- Auxiliary lemma, used in proving the more general result `is_O_cocompact_zpow`. -/
theorem is_O_cocompact_zpow_neg_nat (k : ℕ) :
    Asymptotics.IsBigO (Filter.cocompact E) f fun x => «expr‖ ‖» x ^ (-k : ℤ) :=
  by
  obtain ⟨d, hd, hd'⟩ := f.decay k 0
  simp_rw [norm_iterated_fderiv_zero] at hd'
  simp_rw [Asymptotics.IsBigO, Asymptotics.IsBigOWith]
  refine' ⟨d, Filter.Eventually.filter_mono Filter.cocompact_le_cofinite _⟩
  refine' (Filter.eventually_cofinite_ne 0).mp (Filter.eventually_of_forall fun x hx => _)
  rwa [Real.norm_of_nonneg (zpow_nonneg (norm_nonneg _) _), zpow_neg, ← div_eq_mul_inv, le_div_iff']
  exacts[hd' x, zpow_pos_of_pos (norm_pos_iff.mpr hx) _]
#align is_O_cocompact_zpow_neg_nat is_O_cocompact_zpow_neg_nat
is_O_cocompact_zpow:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem is_O_cocompact_zpow [ProperSpace E] (k : ℤ) :
    Asymptotics.IsBigO (Filter.cocompact E) f fun x => «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k := by
  simpa only [real.rpow_int_cast] using is_O_cocompact_rpow f k
#align is_O_cocompact_zpow is_O_cocompact_zpow
is_O_cocompact_rpow:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⌈ ⌉₊» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem is_O_cocompact_rpow [ProperSpace E] (s : exprℝ) :
    Asymptotics.IsBigO (Filter.cocompact E) f fun x => «expr‖ ‖» x ^ s :=
  by
  let k := «expr⌈ ⌉₊» (-s)
  have hk : -(k : exprℝ) ≤ s := neg_le.mp (Nat.le_ceil (-s))
  refine' (is_O_cocompact_zpow_neg_nat f k).trans _
  refine'
    (_ : Asymptotics.IsBigO Filter.atTop (fun x : exprℝ => x ^ (-k : ℤ)) fun x : exprℝ => x ^ s).comp_tendsto
      tendsto_norm_cocompact_atTop
  simp_rw [Asymptotics.IsBigO, Asymptotics.IsBigOWith]
  refine' ⟨1, Filter.eventually_of_mem (Filter.eventually_ge_atTop 1) fun x hx => _⟩
  rw [one_mul, Real.norm_of_nonneg (real.rpow_nonneg_of_nonneg (zero_le_one.trans hx) _),
    Real.norm_of_nonneg (zpow_nonneg (zero_le_one.trans hx) _), ← real.rpow_int_cast, Int.cast_neg, Int.cast_ofNat]
  exact real.rpow_le_rpow_of_exponent_le hx hk
#align is_O_cocompact_rpow is_O_cocompact_rpow

  FunLike.ext f g h

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- Every Schwartz function is differentiable at any point. -/
@[protected]
theorem differentiable_at (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) {x : E} : differentiable_at (exprℝ) f x :=
  f.differentiable.differentiable_at

differentiable:

/-- Every Schwartz function is differentiable. -/
@[protected]
theorem differentiable (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) : differentiable (exprℝ) f :=
  (f.smooth 1).differentiable rfl.le
#align differentiable differentiable

decay_smul_aux:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem decay_smul_aux (k n : ℕ) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) (c : 𝕜) (x : E) :
    «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n («expr • » c f) x) =
      «expr‖ ‖» c * «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n f x) :=
  by rw [mul_comm («expr‖ ‖» c), mul_assoc, iterated_fderiv_const_smul_apply (f.smooth _), norm_smul]
#align decay_smul_aux decay_smul_aux
decay_neg_aux:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem decay_neg_aux (k n : ℕ) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) (x : E) :
    «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n (-f) x) =
      «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n f x) :=
  by
  nth_rw 4 [← norm_neg]
  congr
  exact iterated_fderiv_neg_apply

decay_add_le_aux:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem decay_add_le_aux (k n : ℕ) (f g : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) (x : E) :
    «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n (f + g) x) ≤
      «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n f x) +
        «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n g x) :=
  by
  rw [← mul_add]
  refine' mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left _ (by positivity)
  convert norm_add_le _ _
  exact iterated_fderiv_add_apply (f.smooth _) (g.smooth _)

decay:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Moritz Doll

/-- All derivatives of a Schwartz function are rapidly decaying. -/
theorem decay (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) (k n : ℕ) :
    ∃ (C : exprℝ)(hC : 0 < C), ∀ x, «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n f x) ≤ C :=
  by
  rcases f.decay' k n with ⟨C, hC⟩
  exact ⟨max C 1, by positivity, fun x => (hC x).trans (le_max_left _ _)⟩
#align decay decay
coe_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
theorem coe_zero : ↑(0 : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) = (0 : E → F) :=
  rfl
#align coe_zero coe_zero
coe_hom_injective:
theorem coe_hom_injective : function.injective (coe_hom E F) :=
  by
  rw [coe_coe_hom]
  exact FunLike.coe_injective
#align coe_hom_injective coe_hom_injective
coe_fn_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
@[simp]
theorem coe_fn_zero : coe_fn (0 : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) = (0 : E → F) :=
  rfl
#align coe_fn_zero coe_fn_zero
coe_coe_hom:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
theorem coe_coe_hom : (coe_hom E F : «expr𝓢( , )» E F → E → F) = coe_fn :=
  rfl
#align coe_coe_hom coe_coe_hom
bounds_nonempty:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem bounds_nonempty (k n : ℕ) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) :
    ∃ c : exprℝ, c ∈ { c : exprℝ | 0 ≤ c ∧ ∀ x : E, «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n f x) ≤ c } :=
  let ⟨M, hMp, hMb⟩ := f.decay k n
  ⟨M, le_of_lt hMp, hMb⟩
#align bounds_nonempty bounds_nonempty
bounds_bdd_below:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem bounds_bdd_below (k n : ℕ) (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) :
    BddBelow { c | 0 ≤ c ∧ ∀ x, «expr‖ ‖» x ^ k * «expr‖ ‖» (iterated_fderiv (exprℝ) n f x) ≤ c } :=
  ⟨0, fun _ ⟨hn, _⟩ => hn⟩
#align bounds_bdd_below bounds_bdd_below
add_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
@[simp]
theorem add_apply {f g : «expr𝓢( , )» E F} {x : E} : (f + g) x = f x + g x :=
  rfl
#align add_apply add_apply
Continuous:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝓢( , )» -/
#print Continuous /-
/-- Every Schwartz function is continuous. -/
@[continuity, protected]
theorem Continuous (f : «expr𝓢( , )» E F) : Continuous f :=
  (f.smooth 0).continuous
#align continuous Continuous
-/
